depression; sunken; swamp
депрессия; затонувший; болото
purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 洼)
Antonyms: 高
Pictophonetic: 洼 indicates the sound; 穴 (cave) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples: 窪地 [ wā dì ]: depression; low-lying ground
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿱ Above to below
    • 穴 [ xué ] cave, den, hole
    • 洼 [ wā ] pit, hollow, depression; swamp
heisig_constituent: depression, hole, house, human legs, water, water droplets, water pistol, ivy, square jewel, soil, dirt, ground, soil2, dirt2, ground2
heisig_story: Hole . . . water . . . ivy. The depression referred to here is a sunken place in the ground, rather than in one's spirits.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: depression, cave in, sink, become hollow
koohiiStory1: A depression is a hole in the ground. Water naturally collects there which provides moisture for vines to grow.
koohiiStory2: The depression in the ground become a trap: the hole was filled with water and covered with ivy.
kunYomi: くぼ.む、くぼ.み、くぼ.まる、くぼ
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the hole (穴) with the water (氵) where the jewel (圭) was is a hollow
humanum_full_description_en:
From " water " to "窐" sound. Xiao Zhuan writes "漥", but nowadays he writes " wa ". "Shuowen" is based on the original meaning of clear water. "Said Wen": "Yi, Qing Shui Ye. One said: Yu Ye. From the water, Qian Sheng."

" Wa " means a small puddle. "Jade articles. Ministry of Water: "Wa, ox feet and water." Such as "Liu Zixin." "Viewing the Quantity": "There are no dragons within the hoof, and no pines and cypresses are planted above the peiyuan."

" Wag " also means depression . "Guang Ya. Interpretation of "I": "Wa, Xiaye." Such as "Laozi. Chapter Twenty-two: "The song is complete, but if it's in vain, it's straight; if it's in vain, it's profitable, and if it's wrong, it's new." "Three Kingdoms. Wei Shu. "Manchu Chong Chuan": "Although Cao Xiu is very fruitful and hopes to use soldiers, today he follows the Tao, with his back to the lake and the river, easy to advance and difficult to retreat, and this is a depression for soldiers."

" Wa " also means deep. "Jade articles. "Acupoints": "Wa, deep pan." For example, Bai Juyi of the Tang Dynasty "Feng He Si An Xianggong sent by Li Suzhou to the strange shape of the Taihu stone because of the 20 rhymes and dreams": "Sharp Langwan bamboo shoots, Wa pierced the agate ribbon."
humanum_short_description_en: From the " water " to the sound of "窐". Xiao Zhuan writes "漥", but nowadays he writes " wa ". "Shuowen" is based on the original meaning of clear water.
humanum_full_description:
從「水」，「窐」聲。小篆作「漥」，今多寫作「窪」。《說文》以為本義是清水。《說文》：「漥，清水也。一曰：窊也。从水，窐聲。」

　　「窪」表示小水坑。《玉篇．水部》：「窪，牛蹄跡水也。」如《劉子新論．觀量》：「是以蹄窪之內，不生蛟龍；培塿之上，不植松柏。」

　　「窪」也表示凹下。《廣雅．釋詁一》：「窪，下也。」如《老子．第二十二章》：「曲則全，枉則直；窪則盈，弊則新。」《三國志．魏書．滿寵傳》：「曹休雖明果而希用兵，今所從道，背湖旁江，易進難退，此兵之窪地也。」

　　「窪」還表示深。《玉篇．穴部》：「窪，深皃。」如唐代白居易〈奉和思黯相公以李蘇州所寄太湖石奇狀絕倫因題二十韻見示兼呈夢得〉：「尖削琅玕筍，窪剜瑪瑙罍。」
humanum_short_description: 從「水」，「窐」聲。小篆作「漥」，今多寫作「窪」。《說文》以為本義是清水。

從「 水 」，「 窐 」聲。小篆作「 漥 」，今多寫作「 窪 」。《說文》以為本義是清水。《說文》：「漥，清水也。一曰：窊也。从水，窐聲。」 「 窪 」表示小水坑。《玉篇．水部》：「窪，牛蹄跡水也。」如《劉子新論．觀量》：「是以蹄窪之內，不生蛟龍；培塿之上，不植松柏。」 「 窪 」也表示凹下。《廣雅．釋詁一》：「窪，下也。」如《老子．第二十二章》：「曲則全，枉則直；窪則盈，弊則新。」《三國志．魏書．滿寵傳》：「曹休雖明果而希用兵，今所從道，背湖旁江，易進難退，此兵之窪地也。」 「 窪 」還表示深。《玉篇．穴部》：「窪，深皃。」如唐代白居易〈奉和思黯相公以李蘇州所寄太湖石奇狀絕倫因題二十韻見示兼呈夢得〉：「尖削琅玕筍，窪剜瑪瑙罍。」

From the water, Qian Sheng." " Wa" means a small puddle. "Jade articles. Ministry of Water: "Wa, ox feet and water." Such as "Liu Zixin." "Viewing the Quantity": "There are no dragons within the hoof, and no pines and cypresses are planted above the peiyuan." " Wag" also means depression. "Guang Ya. Interpretation of "I": "Wa, Xiaye." "Manchu Chong Chuan": "Although Cao Xiu is very fruitful and hopes to use soldiers, today he follows the Tao, with his back to the lake and the river, easy to advance and difficult to retreat, and this is a depression for soldiers." 窪字的基本解释

窪
wā
见“洼”。

窪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wā］
［《廣韻》烏瓜切，平麻，影。］
亦作“漥1”。
(1)低陷；凹下。
(2)小水坑。
(3)深。

窪字的康熙字典解释

【午集下】【穴字部】　窪； 康熙笔画：14； 页码：页866第61
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?烏瓜切，音洼。【玉篇】深也，淸水也。一曰窊也。【老子·道德經】窪則盈。　又【韻會小補】於佳切。水名。與洼同。　又【篇海】去聲，音?。低窪。　又【集韻】庾頃切，音潁。義同。

窪字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
窪字的起名意思

暂无。
